snippet: After three straight postseason appearances, the Knicks will be done after the regular season, as the Hawks earned a 98-85 home victory over the Heat.
abstract: NBA Roundup; Atlanta Hawks earn emphatic 98-85 victory over Miami Heat, to nail down the eighth and final playoff spot in the Eastern Conference; win ends New York Knicks hopes for playoff spot; other scores noted.
lead_paragraph: After three straight postseason appearances, the Knicks will be done after the regular season, as the Hawks earned a 98-85 home victory over the Heat.

headline.main: Knicks’ Playoff Hopes End as Hawks Cruise Past Heat
headline.print_headline: Knicks’ Playoff Hopes End as Hawks Cruise Past Heat
